results.title: 3-Idiots
results.overview: Two friends are searching for their long lost companion. They revisit their college days and recall the memories of their friend who inspired them to think differently, even as the rest of the world called them idiots.
results.starring: Aamir Khan,Madhvan, Sharman Joshi, Kareena Kapoor

results.title: Extraction
results.overview: A hardened gun-for-hire's latest mission becomes a soul-searching race to survive when he's sent into Bangladesh to rescue a drug lord's kidnapped son.

results.title: Barbie
results.overview: Barbie and Ken are having the time of their lives in the colorful and seemingly perfect world of Barbie Land. However, when they get a chance to go to the real world, they soon discover the joys and perils of living among humans.
results.starring: Margot Robbie, Ryan Gosling, America Ferrera, Kate McKinnon

results.title: SeetaRaman
results.overview: Barbie and Ken are having the time of their lives in the colorful and seemingly perfect world of Barbie Land. However, when they get a chance to go to the real world, they soon discover the joys and perils of living among humans.
